Room.Name: East Tower
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the eastern Tower high above the City of Kista.
Room.LongDescription: You are in a well-lit, red room with numerous glowing orbs and other interesting artifacts. There is a large, worm-like drawing shaped like a C on the wall on a blue background. There are also different phases of the moon mapped out and a large map of the Kista Valley. Unfortunately, you can't seem to make out exactly what the map says. The scroll with the moon phases looks pretty readable, though.
